channel.title: (pi) How to make source connectable?
channel.description:
:confused: Okay, i have portforwarded, I have DOC, My firewall has 43594 open, My router is also portforwarded, i can only connect to my LocalHost, i try and use my No-Ip and it always says error, i have friends also try it, nothing when they try to connect, its like my source wont use my ip address and only allows my Local, is this the problem? someone help please!
:eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek:

item.title: (pi) How to make source connectable?
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

Kankur:

Thanks alot guys, i went to canyouseeme.org and somehow my ports or something is not open, i have them correctly forwarded and out of my firewall, i cant seem to figure this out.

If you need help, add me on msn x-x-box@hotmail.com or if you have teamviewer pm me your id and pass

item.title: (pi) How to make source connectable?
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

l33txtroll:

try going into client.java do ctrl+f type in “server =” without the speach marks then the first one that comes up replace whats there with ur no-ip

That’s for delta, pi auto connects to the host.

Read full topic

item.title: (pi) How to make source connectable?
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

Kankur:

How do i set the ip on the source?

If it’s pi, it auto connects to wherever you are hosting it, just change the ip in the client.

item.title: (pi) How to make source connectable?
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

Okay, i have portforwarded, I have DOC, My firewall has 43594 open, My router is also portforwarded, i can only connect to my LocalHost, i try and use my No-Ip and it always says error, i have friends also try it, nothing when they try to connect, its like my source wont use my ip address and only allows my Local, is this the problem? someone help please!

:eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek:[/quote]
First off, check if your port is correctly open at canyouseeme.org. Then get a no-ip and set that no-ip as the ip of your source and client.

Read full topic
